net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation

Class AbstractValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation.AbstractValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompositeValidator, PassAllValidator, RequiredLocalizationValidator, RequiredValueValidator, StringValueValidator

    public abstract class AbstractValidator
extends Object
implements Validator
    Abstract implementation of validator. Provides getter and setter methods for localized text keys used to get the error message text from a LocaleContext. A default short message is provided if neither the short message key or the short message are provided.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)
